Package repository

Interface CrudRepository<ID,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    ID - - type E must have an attribute of type ID
    E - - type of entities saved in repository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRepository, HomeworkRepository, StudentRepository

    public interface CrudRepository<ID,E>
    CRUD operations repository interface

      • delete

        E delete​(ID id)
  throws IllegalArgumentException,
         ValidatorException
        removes the entity with the specified id
        Parameters:
        id - id must be not null
        Returns:
        the removed entity or null if there is no entity with the given id
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - - if the argument is illegal
        ValidatorException - - if the arguments are not good if the given id is null.

      • update

        E update​(E entity)
  throws ValidatorException,
         IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        entity - entity must not be null
        Returns:
        null - if the entity is updated, otherwise returns the entity - (e.g id does not exist).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given entity is null.
        ValidatorException - if the entity is not valid.
